title: Assault on Hill 400
description: On November 14, 1944, the 2nd Ranger Battalion is tasked with sieging the German town of Bergstein, and Hill 400, a highly strategic position that provides the Reich with high ground for artillery.

title: The Adventures of Smilin' Jack
description: Just before World War II, the Chinese and American governments mount a joint operation to prevent the Germans and Japanese from taking over the strategic island of Mandon.

title: Hiroshima
description: The grisly events leading to the first attack with a nuclear weapon.

title: Lola
description: 1940, Thom and Mars have built a machine, LOLA, that can intercept radio and TV broadcasts from the future

title: Warhorse One
description: A gunned down Navy SEAL Master Chief must guide a child to safety through a gauntlet of hostile Taliban insurgents and survive the brutal Afghanistan wilderness.

title: Verimalja
description: Finnish volunteers join an SS treasure hunt in 1943, orchestrated by a Vatican bishop. As the journey leads them ever deeper behind the eastern front, Myllykoski, a would-be priest, has to decide if the mission is a calling or a curse.

title: LOC: Kargil
description: LOC KARGIL is the story of Indian soldiers fighting in Kargil and being remembered by their family. There is Vikram Batra (Abhishek Bachchan), a daredevil soldier who won Param Vir Chakra for his bravery. Manoj Pandey (Ajay Devgan), a poet by nature laid his live and was served with Param Vir Chakra too. The toughest of all the soldiers was Lt. Balwant Singh (Akshaye Khanna) awarded the Mahaveer Chakra. Major Deepak Rampal (Sanjay Kapoor) was on ... [more] LOC KARGIL is the story of Indian soldiers fighting in Kargil and being remembered by their family. There is Vikram Batra (Abhishek Bachchan), a daredevil soldier who won Param Vir Chakra for his bravery. Manoj Pandey (Ajay Devgan), a poet by nature laid his live and was served with Param Vir Chakra too. The toughest of all the soldiers was Lt. Balwant Singh (Akshaye Khanna) awarded the Mahaveer Chakra. Major Deepak Rampal (Sanjay Kapoor) was on leave when the call for war came. He was the backbone of the unit, awarded VIR CHAKRA. Lt. Col. Y. K. Joshi (Sanjay Dutt), a daredevil soldier was too awarded VIR CHAKRA. Captain Anuj Nayyar (Saif Ali Khan) for whom death was just another game lived his life and was awarded with Mahaveer Chakra. [less]

title: To the Shores of Tripoli
description: An irreverent and selfish young man, Chris Winters, joins the US Marines before America's entry into World War II. His drill instructor, Sgt. Dixie Smith, served in World War I with his father and Chris fully expects an easy ride. He went to a military academy - until he was expelled - and has the makings of a good soldier, if only he would take it just a bit more seriously. Beautiful nurse Mary Carter catches his eye and he spends much of his ti... [more] An irreverent and selfish young man, Chris Winters, joins the US Marines before America's entry into World War II. His drill instructor, Sgt. Dixie Smith, served in World War I with his father and Chris fully expects an easy ride. He went to a military academy - until he was expelled - and has the makings of a good soldier, if only he would take it just a bit more seriously. Beautiful nurse Mary Carter catches his eye and he spends much of his time trying to win her affections. He's also doing his best to get out of the Marines but on the day he submits his resignation, the Japanese bomb Pearl Harbor. [less]

title: How the Holocaust Began
description: The Nazi evolution from murderous anti-semitism into organised death camps, as documented in this sober piece of historical excavation from Holocaust specialist James Bulgin, is truly shocking in its specificity. An ad-hoc interpr...

title: Sisu
description: When an ex-soldier who discovers gold in the Lapland wilderness tries to take the loot into the city, Nazi soldiers led by a brutal SS officer battle him.

title: Chess Story
description: To withstand the psychological torture of the Gestapo, a lawyer imprisoned by the Nazis finds refuge in the world of chess.

title: Narvik: Hitler's First Defeat
description: April 1940. The eyes of the world are on Narvik, a small town in northern Norway, source of the iron ore needed for Hiter's war machinery. Through two months of fierce winter warfare, Hitler is dealt his first defeat.

title: Battlebox
description: With a sudden attack by the Japanese, British Major-General Maltby and his top officers struggle with the decision to either fight to the death or offer a humiliating surrender of the British Colony of Hong Kong.

title: Battle for Saipan
description: A Surgeon defends a hospital from invading enemy forces in the Battle of Saipan during World War II.

title: Gulltransporten
description: He's not the bravest of men, but he's given a great responsibility and an enormous task - to get the whole Norwegian gold reserve away from the Germans during the invasion of Norway during the outbreak of WW2.

title: Plebs: Soldiers of Rome
description: Three Plebs join the army in peace-time, hoping to win respect, romance and military discounts at selected restaurants. But when war's declared they're sent to fight on the front line of a Roman legion for a cause they don't believe in. Now their main interest is the struggle for survival.

title: Devotion
description: A pair of U.S. Navy fighter pilots risk their lives during the Korean War and become some of the Navy's most celebrated wingmen.

title: Image of Victory
description: Inspired by true events in 1948. Hassanin, an Egyptian filmmaker, is tasked with documenting a raid on the isolated kibbutz Nitzanim. When the kibbutz learns of the impending army raid, Mira, a young but valiant mother, is forced to reckon with the true cost of war and make an impossible choice.

title: All Quiet on the Western Front (2022)
description: A young German soldier's terrifying experiences and distress on the western front during World War I.

title: The Hunted (2022)
description: A soldier is tasked by his government agency to take a box that contains something secret that cannot fall into enemy hands, his entire team is massacred and he finds himself hunted by an organization that wants what he's got.

title: Wolves of War
description: At the end of WWII, a tough British officer leads a band of Allied commandos into enemy territory in Bavaria on one last impossible mission to extract an American held hostage by the Nazis.

title: Burial
description: A small group of Russian soldiers have the task of taking Hitler's discovered remains back to Stalin in Moscow.

title: Sniper. The White Raven
description: After suffering a tragedy at the hand of invading soldiers in Donbas, an Ukrainian physics teacher seeks revenge. He sets his sights on an elite Russian sniper whose elimination could change the tide of the conflict.

title: Iron Cross: The Road to Normandy
description: Captain Muller struggle to survive fighting overwhelming Russian forces. Wounded he is sent to Normandy As our Americans Lee and Trey are preparing for D-day. Soon score are settled and battle brings our GIs and Germans on the same path

title: Benediction
description: Legendary 20th Century war poet Siegfried Sassoon's life-long quest for personal salvation through his experiences with family, war, his writing, and destructive relationships goes unresolved, never realizing it can only come from within.

title: Wolf Hound
description: Inspired by the real-life German special operations unit KG 200 that shot down, repaired, and flew Allied aircraft as Trojan horses, "Wolf Hound" takes place in 1944 German-occupied France and follows the daring exploits of Jewish-American fighter pilot Captain David Holden. Ambushed behind enemy lines, Holden must rescue a captured B-17 Flying Fortress crew, evade a ...

title: Spitfire Over Berlin
description: August 1944. With the American Eighth Air Force poised to strike over Nazi Germany, British Intelligence learns that they could be flying into a deadly trap. With only hours to spare, Flight Lieutenant Edward Barnes must fly a life and death mission over Berlin in his unarmed Spitfire to obtain photographic evidence and save the lives of 1200 men.

title: The Huntress of Auschwitz
description: A young American girl travels to Europe to track down the Nazi guard responsible for the murder of her great-grandparents.

title: Foxhole
description: Over 36 hours in three different wars, a small group of soldiers grapples with mortality, futility and an increasingly volatile combat situation.

title: Operation Mincemeat
description: During WWII, two intelligence officers use a corpse and false papers to outwit German troops.

title: The Shadow in My Eye
description: On March 21st, 1945, the British Royal Air Force set out on a mission to bomb Gestapo's headquarters in Copenhagen. The raid had fatal consequences as some of the bombers accidentally targeted a school and more than 120 people were killed, 86 of whom were children.

title: Operation Overlord
description: A week before storming the beaches of Normandy, two US Soldiers infiltrate an abandoned complex to rescue a prisoner of war from the clutches of the Nazi regime.

title: Onoda: 10,000 Nights in the Jungle
description: When Japan surrenders at the end of World War II, soldier Hiroo Onoda retreats into the jungles of the Philippines to continue the war himself for another 10,000 days.

title: Hell Hath No Fury
description: Branded a traitor by her countrymen, French national Marie DuJardin is rescued by American soldiers on one condition: to survive, she must lead them to a cache of gold hunted by the Nazis, the French resistance, and the Americans alike.

title: This Is Not a War Story
description: A ragtag group of veterans in New York deal with the aftermath of war by creating unusual art.

title: Sisters Apart
description: Rojda, a German soldier and native Kurd, volunteers for a mission to train female Kurdish soldiers in Iraq to fight ISIS. No one must know that she is actually looking for her missing sister.

title: The East (2021)
description: A young Dutch soldier deployed to suppress post-WWII independence efforts in the Netherlands' colony of Indonesia finds himself torn between duty and conscience when he joins an increasingly ruthless commander's elite squad.

title: The Forgotten Battle
description: 1944, the Second World War. A British glider pilot, a Dutch boy fighting on the German side and a Dutch female resistance member all end up involved in the Battle of the Scheldt. Their choices differ, but their goal is the same: freedom.

title: Hampton's Legion
description: When the Confederacy can no longer finance massive armies, Wade Hampton III, using his own money started, financed, and supplied his own infantry, cavalry, and artillery to help fight the war.

title: The Last Frontier
description: The film tells the story of the Podolsk cadets heroic stand outside Moscow in October 1941. Cadets from the Podolsk infantry and artillery schools were sent to the Ilyinsky line of defense...

title: The War Below
description: During World War I, a group of British miners are recruited to tunnel underneath no mans land and set bombs from below the German front in hopes of breaking the deadly stalemate of the Battle of Messines.

title: Unsinkable: Japan's Lost Battleship
description: October 24, 1944, Japans navy gambles on a decisive victory against the United States to turn the tide of World War II. Instead, Musashi, its top-secret super battleship, ends up at the bottom of the ocean.

title: For Sama
description: FOR SAMA is both an intimate and epic journey into the female experience of war.

title: The Rifleman
description: After losing his mother and his home, Arturs finds some consolation in joining the army. However, war is nothing like he imagined.

title: Hal King
description: Hal King is part of the 1950s beatnik jazz scene; running with drug addicts and fast women. But after being drafted for the Korean War, he may be forced to chose between carrying his fathers political legacy, and the woman he loves.

title: Da 5 Bloods
description: Four African-American vets battle the forces of man and nature when they return to Vietnam seeking the remains of their fallen Squad Leader and the gold fortune he helped them hide.

title: Shadow in the Cloud
description: A female WWII pilot traveling with top secret documents on a B-17 Flying Fortress encounters an evil presence on board the flight.

title: The Outpost
description: A small team of U.S. soldiers battle against hundreds of Taliban fighters in Afghanistan.

Two young British soldiers during the First World War are given an impossible mission: deliver a message deep in enemy territory that will stop 1,600 men, and one of the soldiers brothers, from walking straight into a deadly trap.

title: No Chance
description: When a group of international criminals from his past kidnap his daughter, the world's greatest commando sets out for revenge in this action-packed parody of everything you loved about the 80's.

title: Battle of the Bulge: Winter War
description: The Battle of The Bulge. Lt. Robert Cappa and his platoon of 2nd Infantry Division soldiers must defend a vital supply depot from being captured by attacking German soldiers. With enemies ...

title: Recon
description: The story of four American soldiers, who, after they witness a vicious murder of an innocent civilian at the hands of their Sergeant, are sent on a suicide mission led by a local partisan.

title: Charlie's Letters
description: 16 year old aspiring director Elliott Hasler's epic depiction of his great-grandfather's WW2 experiences; an escaped POW's battle for survival whilst on the run in war-torn Italy, as his wife and young son eagerly await news in England.

title: Behind the Line: Escape to Dunkirk
Summerland
description: During World War II, an Englishwoman (Gemma Arterton) opens her heart to an evacuee after initially resolving to be rid of him in this moving journey of womanhood, love and friendship.

title: Moffie
description: Nicholas has long known he is different, that there is something shameful and unacceptable in him that must stay hidden, denied even. But South Africa's minority government are embroiled in...

title: Battle Scars
description: After his best friend is drafted to fight in Vietnam, a young man must grapple with the reality of life before and after war.

title: Ghosts of War
description: Follows five battle-hardened American soldiers assigned to hold a French Chateau near the end of World War II. Formerly occupied by the Nazi high command, this unexpected respite quickly ...

title: The Outpost
description: A small team of U.S. soldiers battle against hundreds of Taliban fighters in Afghanistan.

title: Top Gunner
description: Recent graduates of a secluded U.S. Air Force base must protect a gene-editing bio-weapon from the Russian military - who are desperate to seize the deadly viral agent at any cost.

title: The Point of No Return
description: A dwindling group of German soldiers battle to return to their lines on the harsh Eastern Front.

title: Da 5 Bloods
description: Four African-American vets battle the forces of man and nature when they return to Vietnam seeking the remains of their fallen Squad Leader and the gold fortune he helped them hide.

title: 1917: The Real Story
description: Documentary looking at the real events behind the film 1917. What elements were true and the aftermath in the events that followed.

title: Secret Weapon
description: Its the Second World War. The Red Army had to retreat in a hurry and left their top secret weapon, "Katyusha", behind. A group of 8 soldiers is sent to do everything possible not to let "Katyusha" get into the hands of the Germans.

title: Enemy Lines
description: In the frozen, war torn landscape of occupied Poland during World War II, a crack team of allied commandos are sent on a deadly mission behind enemy lines to extract a rocket scientist from the hands of the Nazis.

title: Girls of the Sun
description: A Kurdish female battalion prepares to take back their town from extremists.

title: Kingdom (2019)
description: In ancient China, a young boy dreams of becoming the greatest general of the Qin Kingdom.

title: Waiting for Anya
description: During the harrows of WWII, Jo, a young shepherd along with the help of the widow Horcada, helps to smuggle Jewish children across the border from southern France into Spain.

title: The Windermere Children
description: This is the stark, moving ultimately redemptive story of the bonds these children make with one another, and of how the friendships forged at Windermere become a lifeline to a fruitful future.

title: The Battle of Jangsari
description: A depiction of the Battle of Incheon during the Korean War in 1950.

title: Rocket Hunter
description: In one of the most dangerous missions of the war, an American B-17 pilot volunteers to fly a surrendered Messerschmidt 109 on a daring flight through the heart of Germany to try to prevent ...

title: Jojo Rabbit
description: A young boy in Hitler's army finds out his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

Two young British soldiers during the First World War are given an impossible mission: deliver a message deep in enemy territory that will stop 1,600 men, and one of the soldiers brothers, from walking straight into a deadly trap.

title: Danger Close (2019)
description: In August 1966, in a Vietnamese rubber plantation called Long Tan, 108 young and inexperienced Australian and New Zealand soldiers are fighting for their lives against 2500 North Vietnamese and Viet Cong soldiers.

title: Sobibor
description: "Sobibor" is based on the history of the Sobibór extermination camp uprising during WWII and Soviet officer Alexander Pechersky. When he was a POW in Sobibor, he managed to do the ...

title: Tubelight
description: Tubelight is the story of a man's unshakable faith in himself and the love for his family.

title: Werewolf (2019)
description: Children liberated from a Nazi concentration camp have to overcome hunger, thirst and vicious dogs in an abandoned mansion surrounded by the forest.

title: The Great War
description: During the last days of the Great War, a group of U.S. soldiers are sent behind enemy lines to rescue a lost platoon.

title: Jarhead: Law of Return
description: Major Ronan Jackson (Devon Sawa), an accomplished fighter pilot for the Israel Defense Forces and son of a U.S. Senator (Robert Patrick), is shot down while flying through Syrian airspace. ...

title: Indivisible
description: INDIVISIBLE is the extraordinary true story of Army Chaplain Darren Turner and his wife Heather. When war etches battle scars on their hearts, they face one more battle: the fight to save their marriage. One marriage, one family, under God.

title: In Syria
description: A mother attempts to keep her family safe as war rages and a sniper lies in wait outside her home. This nerve-wracking study of life in Damascus won an Audience Award at Berlinale.

title: Jirga
description: Made under extraordinary, and extremely dangerous, conditions, Jirga tells the emotional story of a former Australian soldier who travels to Afghanistan to seek forgiveness.

title: Escape and Evasion
description: After his men are killed in Burma, a lone soldier returns home in search of solace. Hiding a dark secret and confronted by an unrelenting journalist, he's forced to face the ghosts of his past one last time.

title: The Kill Team
description: A young American soldier in Afghanistan is disturbed by his commanding officer's behavior and is faced with a moral dilemma.

title: Pumpkins
description: A teen Horror Movie set in the 80's in the North of England.

title: Dauntless: The Battle of Midway
description: By June 1942, the Japanese Navy has swept across the Pacific. In an effort to change the course of the war, a United States carrier group is positioned off the coast of Midway, tasked with springing a trap on the enemy. During this pivotal battle, the two-man crew of a U.S. Navy dive bomber is forced to ditch in the sea. Set adrift, the men look towards their comrades for rescue; namely, the ragtag crew of a PBY Catalina, who are sent to search for survivors. Amid the vast openness of the Pacific, with days passing and the chance of rescue fading, the men are forced to face their own mortality.

title: The Bird Catcher
description: After being torn away from her family, 14-year-old Esther must assume a new identity in order to navigate her survival under the hostility of Nazi-occupied Norway.

title: Semper Fi
description: The story sees Courtney as Cal, a by-the-book police officer who makes ends meet as a Marine Corps reservist along with his rowdy and inseparable group of childhood friends. When Cal's younger, reckless half-brother Oyster (Wolff) accidentally kills a guy in a bar fight and tries to flee, Cal forces him to face the music. After an unfair sentence, Oyster fights for survival in a dangerous Pennsylvania prison system while Cal and his friends are deployed to fight the lethal insurgency in Iraq. Overseas, Cal's world is shaken, and after he barely makes it home alive, he resolves to break Oyster out of prison - no matter the cost.

title: Jarhead Law of Return
description: Major Ronan Jackson (Devon Sawa), an accomplished fighter pilot for the Israel Defense Forces and son of a U.S. Senator (Robert Patrick), is shot down while flying through Syrian airspace. After miraculously surviving the crash, Jackson is taken captive by a group of Hezbollah militiamen. A gripping and powerful story packed with hard-hitting action, Jarhead: Law of Return follows a squad of elite soldiers, led by Gunnery Sergeant Dave Torres (Amaury Nolasco), as they risk their own lives in the hopes of saving an ally they've never met.

title: Karmouz War
description: During the 1940s, a girl was raped by a group of English soldiers, and three young Egyptians retaliate. The British soldier is being held at the Karamouz police station in Alexandria, headed by General Youssef al-Masri (Amir Karara). General Frank Adams demands that the English soldier be handed over to him, but Yusuf refuses. The British army is led to block the police station, and enters a fierce confrontation with General Yusuf and the rest of the Egyptian soldiers.

title: Shanghai Fortress
description: Set in the future, the city of Shanghai battle to defend itself against an ongoing attack by an alien force that has attacked and laid siege to numerous cities around the globe in it's quest to harvest a hidden energy only found on earth.

title: The Keeper
description: The story of a man whose love for football, for England and for the love of his life, Margaret, saw him rise from Nazi 'villain' to British hero. Bert Trautmann, the German goalkeeper won over even his harshest opponents by winning the FA Cup Final for Manchester City in 1956 - playing on with a broken neck to secure victory.

title: Dauntless
description: By June 1942, the Japanese Navy has swept across the Pacific. In an effort to change the course of the war, a United States carrier group is positioned off the coast of Midway, tasked with springing a trap on the enemy. During this pivotal battle, the two-man crew of a U.S. Navy dive bomber is forced to ditch in the sea. Set adrift, the men look towards their comrades for rescue; namely, the ragtag crew of a PBY Catalina, who are sent to search for survivors. Amid the vast openness of the Pacific, with days passing and the chance of rescue fading, the men are forced to face their own mortality.

title: Home of the Brave
description: Three soldiers struggle to readjust to life at home after returning home from a lengthy tour in Iraq.

title: Union
description: A woman disguises herself as her dead brother, Henry, in order to survive in the Confederate ranks during the Civil War. He marries a widow to rescue her from an arranged marriage. They keep each others secrets and find true love.

title: The Messenger
description: Film about the lead up to the Polish uprising against German occupation at the end of the Second World War.

title: Wolf (2019)
description: Picking up from the explosive cliffhanger of the sixth episode of the miniseries, the film follows the harrowing coup attempt night of July 15th, and the Police Special Operations and ...

title: D-Day: Dog Company
description: Some people called it a suicide, but for the Rangers of the 2nd Battalion, thats another word for mission. When an elite group of American soldiers are ordered to take out a series of ...

title: T-34
description: In 1944, a courageous group of Russian soldiers managed to escape from German captivity in a half-destroyed legendary T-34 tank. Those were the times of unforgettable bravery, fierce fighting, unbreakable love, and legendary miracles.

title: The Precipice
description: The Precipice is set in a pre-apocalyptic world where 2 soldiers, 1 Woman and 1 Man, traverse enemy territory in order to find the location that holds the key to saving them and the country.

title: The Balkan Line
description: NATO bombs Belgrad March 1999. June: Serb army pulls out of Kosovo. Some Muslims believe they can now plunder, rape and kill Serbs in Kosovo. 5 Russians are to take Kosovos airport from such bandits and hold it until peacekeepers arrive.

title: The Filthy Thirteen
description: In 1944, group of rebellious American soldiers known as "The Filthy Thirteen" parachute into Normandy to carry out a deadly mission.

title: The Captain
description: In the last moments of World War II, a young German soldier fighting for survival finds a Nazi captains uniform. Impersonating an officer, the man quickly takes on the monstrous identity of the perpetrators he is trying to escape from.

title: Forgive - Don't Forget
description: A sweeping journey about an American returning a surrendered Japanese samurai sword from World War II.

title: They Shall Not Grow Old
description: A documentary about World War I with never-before-seen footage to commemorate the centennial of the end of the war.

title: Buck Privates
description: Two sidewalk salesman enlist in the army in order to avoid jail, only to find that their drill instructor is the police officer who tried having them imprisoned.

title: Keep 'Em Flying
description: When a barnstorming stunt pilot decides to join the air corps, his two goofball assistants decide to go with him. Since the two are Abbott & Costello, the air corps doesn't know what it's in for.

title: Thirst
description: Two best friends are pitted against each other when a new girl comes to town, matters are further complicated when they enlist together in the U S Army to fight in the Persian Gulf War, the...

title: Scream for Me Sarajevo
description: In 1994 Sarajevo was a city under siege. Mortars and rocket propelled grenades rained onto the city, killing indiscriminately, ever day. Amongst the madness, two United Nations personnel: a...

title: Zoo
description: Young Tom and his misfit friends fight to save 'Buster' the baby elephant during the German air raid bombings of Belfast in 1941.

title: RAF at 100 with Ewan and Colin McGregor
description: The actor and his brother, a former pilot, present a celebration of the Royal Air Force's centenary looking at planes from World War I to the present day and speaking to service personnel from throughout the RAF's history.

title: Journey's End
description: Set in a dugout in Aisne in 1918, it is the story of a group of British officers, led by the mentally disintegrating young officer Stanhope, as they await their fate.

title: The Age of Consequences
description: 'The Hurt Locker' meets 'An Inconvenient Truth', THE AGE OF CONSEQUENCES investigates the impacts of climate change on increased resource scarcity, migration, and conflict through the lens ...

title: My Honor Was Loyalty
description: Untersharführer Ludwig Herckel (Leone Frisa), is a devoted and patriotic soldier of the elite 1st SS Panzer Division Leibstandarte SS Adolf Hitler. As the action begins, we follow a small ...

title: Wolf Warriors II
description: China's deadliest special forces operative settles into a quiet life on the sea. When sadistic mercenaries begin targeting nearby civilians, he must leave his newfound peace behind and return to his duties as a soldier and protector.

title: Es war einmal in Deutschland...
description: David Berman and his friends, all Holocaust survivors, have only one purpose: to go to America as soon as possible. For this they need money. Close to his aim, David is not only deprived of his savings but also overtaken by his shady past.

title: 1971: Beyond Borders
description: The story of the 1971 war between India and Pakistan is told from the perspective of a soldier.

title: Carla's Song
description: In 1987 during the time of war, bus driver George Lennox encounters an exile named Carla and is soon impressive by her sad life: her back is scarred, her family dispersed, her lover missing, and she is about to suicide. While trying to help the hapless women, George gradually grow a feeling to her.

title: Underground 1995
description: Black marketeers Marko and Blacky manufacture and sell weapons to the Communist resistance in WWII Belgrade, living the good life along the way. Marko eventually abandons Blacky, steals his girlfriend, continues to sell illegal arms and drugs when the war is already over.

title: Fury
description: April 1945, as the Allies make their final push in the European Theatre, a battle-hardened Army sergeant named Wardaddy (Brad Pitt) commands a Sherman tank which has nickname Fury and his five-man crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Outnumbered, and out-gunned, Wardaddy and his men face overwhelming odds in their heroic attempts to strike at the heart of Nazi Germany.

title: The Founding Of A Republic
description: Inspired by true events, Founding of a Republic weaves a rousing tale of one man who fought against the tyranny of a ruler and led his people in battle in the ultimate sacrifice for his country.

title: Princess of Mars
description: The movie tells the story of a US soldier who finds himself inexplicably transported to Mars in the midst of a war between two alien races. Naked and surrounded by hostile aliens, John Carter must fight for survival as aliens try to kill him and/or make him eat bugs.

title: Union
description: A woman disguises herself as her dead brother, Henry, in order to survive in the Confederate ranks during the Civil War. He marries a widow to rescue her from an arranged marriage. They keep each others secrets and find true love.

title: D-Day
description: Some people called it a suicide, but for the Rangers of the 2nd Battalion, that's another word for mission. When an elite group of American soldiers are ordered to take out a series of German machine gun nests, they find themselves blindly venturing into hostile territory. Outnumbered and outgunned they must risk life and limb as they cross treacherous terrain, never knowing where the enemy might be hiding.

title: Beyond the Line
description: "A British soldier is shot down from his plane over enemy territory towards the end of Would War II. As the enemy closes in, he’s saved by an American soldier and together they must defeat the enemy to make it back to friendly territory alive. It’s the close of World War II. Unwilling to surrender, rogue German forces shoot down a returning British squadron leaving Sydney Baker (Chris Walters) wounded and lost with the enemy closing in. He’s saved by American soldier William Summers (Jackson Berlin) and the duo must face their fears, both internal and external, to defeat the enemy and make it back to friendly territory alive. "

title: 15 Minutes of War
description: February 1976. Somalian rebels hijack a school bus carrying 21 French children and their teacher in Djibouti City. When the terrorists drive it to a no-man’s-land on the border between Somalia and French territory, the French Government sends out a newly formed elite squad to rescue the hostages. Within a few hours, the highly trained team arrives to the crisis area, where the Somalian National Army has taken position behind the barbed wire on the border. The French unit is left with very few options to rescue the hostages. As the volatile situation unravels, the French men quickly come up with a daring plan: carry out a simultaneous 5 men sniper attack to get the children and the teacher out safely. A true story.

title: The Aftermath
description: In the aftermath of World War II, a British colonel and his wife are assigned to live in Hamburg during the post-war reconstruction, but tensions arise with the German widower who lives with them.

title: The Legend of 5 Mile Cave
description: A mysterious drifter bonds with a boy with tales of the West. Past and present collide when a lawman appears seeking long-lost gold.

title: Lancaster Skies
description: Douglas, a broken, solitary, Spitfire Ace, must overcome his past to lead a Lancaster bomber crew in the pivotal aerial war over Berlin, in 1944.

title: Greyhound Attack
description: WWII drama from film-maker Christopher Forbes which follows American fighter pilots on a perilous mission into the skies of enemy territory.

title: The Great Battle
description: Kingdom of Goguryeo, ancient Korea, 645. The ruthless Emperor Taizong of Tang invades the country and leads his armies towards the capital, achieving one victory after another, but on his way is the stronghold of Ansi, protected by General Yang Man-chu, who will do everything possible to stop the invasion, even if his troops are outnumbered by thousands of enemies.

title: Saving Leningrad
description: September 1941. In a turn of events young lovebirds Kostya and Nastya find themselves on board of a barge that will evacuate people from sieged Leningrad. At night the barge gets into the storm. When it starts sinking, enemy planes - but not rescuers - are the first to arrive at the scene.

title: 1945 From This Day
description: In Germany's Hurtgen Forest, during the final days of World War 2, an exhausted and overwhelmed band of American army paratroopers fight for survival amid a deadly hidden threat, escalating internal conflict and seemingly impossible odds.

title: The Puppet Masters
description: The Puppetmaster is a 1993 Taiwanese film directed by Hou Hsiao-hsien. The film tells the story of an 84-year-old man reminisces about his days as a puppeteer and when he was forced to work Japanese propaganda into his acts.

title: The Lost Battalion
description: The film is based on a true story set in 1918 during the final week of World War I. Over 500 men of an American battalion trapped in France at the height of the Argonne campaign. They must face difficulty which they could never ever imaged.

title: Mars Attacks
description: A fleet of Martian spacecraft surrounds the world's major cities and all of humanity waits to see if the extraterrestrial visitors have, as they claim, "come in peace" and soon realize that they have other plans. Are they just misunderstood beings or do they really want to destroy all of humanity?

title: Eye of the Needle
description: In this romantic war thriller starring Donald Sutherland, Kate Nelligan and Stephen MacKenna, Faber is a a Nazi spy stationed in Britain who is trying to get back to his fatherland with vital information about D-Day. Shipwrecked on an island outpost, he meets Lucy, lonely, sexually frustrated wife of a paraplegic ex-fighter pilot. As Faber starts to have feelings for Lucy, his plan is about to take a twist.

title: The Duellists
description: The film revolves around two officers in Napoleon's army - sensible D'Hubert and obsessive Feraud, who spend almost 16 years taking on each other to bloody duels. The final encounter witnesses D'Hubert gaining the upper hand of Feraud -- but that's seems far from the denouement of the story.

title: A Private War
description: Based on the Vanity Fair article "Marie Colvin's Private War", this movie is about Marie Colvin, one of the most celebrated war correspondents of our time.

title: Duck Soup
description: When the tiny nation of Freedonia goes bankrupt, its wealthy benefactor, Mrs. Teasdale (Margaret Dumont), insists that the wacky Rufus T. Firefly (Groucho Marx) become the country's president. Sensing a weakness in leadership, the bordering nation of Sylvania sends in the spies Pinky (Harpo Marx) and Chicolini (Chico Marx) to set the stage for a revolution. As Firefly clashes with the Sylvanian ambassador (Louis Calhern), plenty of mayhem ensues, and the countries verge on all-out war.

title: Indivisible
description: This movie tells the extraordinary true story of Army Chaplain Darren Turner and his wife Heather. When war etches battle scars on their hearts, they face one more battle: the fight to save their marriage. One marriage, one family, under God.

title: The Captain (Der Hauptmann)
description: Based on the arresting true story of the Executioner of Emsland, this movie follows a young German soldier fighting for survival as he finds a Nazi captain's uniform. Impersonating an officer, the man quickly takes on the monstrous identity of the perpetrators he is trying to escape from.

title: Where Hands Touch
description: Set in the most brutal of times: Germany, 1944, the movie follows a 15-year-old girl, daughter of a white German mother and a black African father, who meets a member of the Hitler Youth. They become bound by the realization of the horrors being committed around them.

title: Long Forgotten Fields
description: Lily's routine existence of work, family and friends is called into question when her soldier boyfriend Sam comes home on leave, especially when his worsening post-traumatic stress disorder causes him to isolate himself.

title: Down River
description: This movie follows four soldiers who are trapped behind enemy lines as they must confront their fears and desires while finding a way back to their battalion.

title: Laugh Or Die
description: This is a story about zest for life and power of laughter, about a group of Finnish actors who are sentenced to death. When an important German general arrives, the camp's vicious commandant forges out a cruel plan: the imprisoners have to perform a comedy - and if they can make the visiting general laugh, they will be spared.

title: Alone We Fight
description: Facing mounting odds, a small but determined band of American soldiers venture into dangerous enemy territory on a mission to stop an advancing German unit from breaking through the Allied line.

title: The Hidden Soldier
description: Bombardment air craft pilot Jack Turner crash lands in China during the Pearl Harbor event, there he is saved by a young local widow named Ying who offers shelter to the injured American pilot. When the Japanese military launch a relentless manhunt to find him, the young widow will risk everything to save him.

title: The Resistance Banker
description: Based on true events, the movie follows banker brothers Walraven and Gijs van Hall as they face their greatest challenge yet when they decide to help fund the Dutch resistance.

title: Hurricane
description: The movie centers on Polish pilots who overcome prejudice to fight against the Luftwaffe with the Royal Air Force during the Second World War, in the hope of protecting both Great Britain and their own Poland from the German advance.

title: Trench 11
description: The only thing more terrifying than the Western Front... is what lies beneath it. In the final days of World War I, a soldier leads a team beneath the trenches to stop a German plot that could turn the tide of the entire war.

title: The Catcher Was a Spy
description: In the midst of World War II, Moe Berg, a 15-year baseball veteran, joins the war effort as a spy to beat Germany in the race to build the first atomic bomb.

title: The Yellow Birds
description: Against the explosive backdrop of the Iraq War, young soldiers Brandon Bartle and Daniel Murphy navigate the terrors of the Gulf War under the command of the older, troubled Sgt. Sterling. All the while, Bartle is tortured by a promise he made to Murph's mother before their deployment.

title: Zoo
description: Young Tom and his misfit friends enlist an older woman in their fight to save Buster the baby elephant during the air raids on Belfast in 1941.

title: The Coming Convergence
description: End-of-days scenarios are postulated. Through newly discovered geological and statistical patterns, many believe it can be proven that the Tribulation is about to begin!

title: Play Dirty
description: The film concentrates on the Desert War in North Africa. Douglas must lead a team of mercenaries to fight in deadly battle against an enemy fuel reserve.

title: Coming Home
description: After her husband must fight for war in Viet Nam, Sally decides to work in local veteran's hospital as a volunteer. She meets Luke Martin who is paralyzed by chance and she falls for him. However, her husband comes back which leads to unexpected circumstances.

title: The 25th Reich
description: Hitler has a secret weapon and has a conspiracy to destroy the world. Five US soldiers are recruited by the OSS to prevent Hitler from devastating everything and rescue innocent people in 1943.

title: A Farewell to Arms
description: The story takes place in a film set in World War I. An American Army volunteer (Rock Hudson) encounters a British nurse and they fall in love. They make a decision to escape to Switzerland to have a new life, but a tragedy suddenly occurs.

title: The Purple Plain
description: The story takes place on a film set in Burma is directed by Robert Parrish. Gregory Peck is an Canadian pilot teams up with two friends to fight in deadly battle for survival.

title: Men in War
description: The film concentrates on fatal battles happening in Korea on 6 September 1950. Mark Benson is a leader of a platoon must face many difficult challenges for survival of many innocent people. Who will stand by him until the ends of War ?

title: Flying Tigers
description: The film centers on the Flying Tigers are American volunteer pilots fight in the fatal battle in China. John Wayne is an excellent leader. He must go through fire and water to control his team and protect his love.

title: The Purple Heart
description: This is the story of the crew of a downed bomber, captured after a run over Tokyo, early in the war. Relates the hardships the men endure while in captivity, and their final humiliation: being tried and convicted as war criminals.

title: Attack on Darfur
description: The plot revolves around six Western journalists who visit a small village in Darfur. When they learn the brutal state sponsored militia called the Janjaweed are heading towards the village, they are faced with an impossible decision...

title: The Spy in Black
description: When a German U-Boat captain is sent on a spying mission to the North of Scotland during World War One, he finds more than he bargained for in his contact, the local schoolmistress.

title: Hangmen Also Die
description: The film takes place on May 27, 1942, the time when the Nazi Reichsprotector of Bohemia, the "Hangman" Reinhard Heydrich, died from the bullets of unidentified resistance fighters. Hangmen Also Die is the story of Heydrich's assassination in fictionalized form.

title: The Big Parade
description: The Big Parade is a drama, romance, war film directed by King Vidor, George W. Hill. It has content revolves around a young American soldier. He witnesses the horrors of the Great War and many tragic death during the War.

title: Wings
description: Jack and David are rivals when they both fall for the pretty Sylvia. However, two young men then find themselves in the same team after joining the air force fighting in the WWI.

title: War Arrow
description: Major Howell Brady is a cavalry officer with the duty of defeating the troublesome Kiowas.To accomplish the mission, Brady has to enlist the Seminoles to help him fight...

title: The Lucky Ones (2008)
description: A meaningful film follows a groups of veterans soldiers inlcuding Colee, TK and Cheever. They return from a cruel battlefield and undergo pain, obsession from disorders. However, they have to learn pass over the past to be alive

title: Battleground
description: Battleground ( 1949) is an Action, War, Drama film tells about squad of the 101st Airborne Division copes with being trapped in the besieged city of Bastogne during the Battle of the Bulge.

title: White Ghost
description: The film focuses on the story of an US soldier nicknamed White Ghost lives in hiding in the jungles of communist Vietnam. The US army finds out about him and sends a black ops team to rescue him. However, the team is lead by a man who wants White Ghost dead.

title: Merry Christmas Mr Lawrence
description: The film concentrates on an extraordinary relationship at a Japanese POW camp in 1942. A camp commandant Ryuichi Sakomoto is attracted by a prisoner David Bowie, which can lead an unexpected consequence

title: They Were Expendable
description: They Were Expendable follows two American PT boats fighting a battle against a fleet of Japanese ships in the Philippines to prove their battle-worthiness at the start of World War II.

title: The Grey Zone
description: The film tells gripping true story of a group of Jewish prisoners who conspire to destroy the crematoriums at Auschwitz, all the while appearing to be Nazi collaborators. From inside the working organs of the death camp, this film asks to what terrible lengths we are willing to go to save our own lives.

title: The Young Lions
description: Based on the novel of the same name by Irwin Shaw, this movie describes the destiny of three soldiers during World War II. The German officer Christian Diestl approves less and less of the war. Jewish-American Noah Ackerman deals with antisemitism at home and in the army while entertainer Michael Whiteacre transforms from playboy to hero.

title: Underground
description: The film tells the story of a black marketer as he abandons his partner, steals his girlfriend, and continues to sell illegal arms and drugs when the war is over. The situation for them is very good until his brother discovers his treachery and all hell breaks loose.

title: From Here To Eternity
description: Sergeant Milt Warden (Burt Lancaster) enters into an affair with Karen (Deborah Kerr), the wife of his commanding officer. Each of their lives will be changed when their stories culminate in the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor.

title: The Trench
description: On the eve of a massive battle with the Germans, as Billy and his comrades await the signal that will send them into battle, they ponder their past and their friendships, before the horrific reality of their situation becomes clear.

title: Under Fire
description: Three journalists in a romantic triangle find themselves under fire from both sides during the last days of the corrupt Somozoa regime in Nicaragua before it falls to a popular revolution in 1979.

title: Of Men and War
description: The film explores the psychological trauma of war experienced by a group of American Iraq veterans upon their return from the front. Ghosts and echoes of the war fill their lives. Wives, children, and parents bear the brunt of their fractured spirits.

title: The Last Valley
description: People in a small German village in the last valley to remain untouched by the devastating Thirty Years' War try to exist in peace with a 17th-century mercenary (Michael Caine) and his men who occupy the valley.

title: The Battle of Neretva
description: Originally released as "The Battle of the Neretva", this sprawling war drama is a tribute to the Yugoslav partisan fighters of World War II. Yul Brynner stars as a guerilla leader whose mission in life is to eradicate all Nazis from his homeland. Out gunned and outnumbered the partisans must not only take care of themselves but try to protect thousands of refugees too.

title: M.I.A. A Greater Evil
description: Decades after the war in Vietnam, three college students and their professor travel to Laos to pan for lost French gold in the winding rivers of the dense forests. They soon get lost in the jungle and by nighttime, realize that they are not alone. As they continue their journey, they are haunted by remnants of the Vietnam War.

title: Thousand Yard Stare
description: Returning home after fighting in Africa during World War II, Roland Rothach, a soldier with PTSD finds reintegrating with family life increasingly difficult as he relives the battle of Kasserine Pass.

title: Journey's End
description: Set in a dugout in Aisne in 1918, it is the story of a group of British officers, led by the mentally disintegrating young officer Stanhope, as they await their fate. Each man is trapped, the days ticking by, the tension rising and the attack drawing ever closer...

title: Hondros
description: The movie tells the story of a celebrated photographer, Chris Hondros, who risked his life to travel to the frontline of wars in such regions as Iraq, Afghanistan, and Libya. Chris was killed in Libya in 2011, but he left a lasting impact on his profession that is still felt today.

title: On the Double
description: At the time of the Invasion of Normandy, an American soldier is asked to impersonate a British General because of his uncanny resemblance to British Colonel MacKenzie. But he doesn't know this work done in order to confuse the Nazi spies and assassins in London.

title: MASH (1970)
description: The film tells a series of vignettes surrounding the life of the namesake Mobile Army Surgical Hospital where it is set. Although the episodic film lacks the cohesion of an overarching singular plot, the vignettes do present a clear means for the film to explore the themes of military life.

title: Major Dundee
description: During the last winter of the Civil War, a Union officer - Amos Dundee leads a contentious troop of Army regulars, Confederate prisoners and scouts on an expedition into Mexico to destroy a band of Apaches who have been attacking U.S. bases in Texas.

title: Ghost Recon Alpha
description: The film revolves around the story of the four main characters, as well as the image representing four classes of playable characters in the game. The plot of the film follows the events that take place in front of the main scene in the game, which is also a turning point in the whole story.

title: Cromwell
description: Unable to tolerate King Charles' policies and the self-interest of the ruling class, Oliver Cromwell, who out of religious fervency declares civil war against the weak-willed British monarch Charles I when the latter threatens to reinstate Catholic rule in England.

title: The Spy in Black
description: In March 1917, Captain Hardt, a World War I German U-boat commander, is ordered to lead a mission to attack the British Fleet at Scapa Flow. He sneaks ashore on the Orkney Islands to meet his contact, Fräulein Tiel. Then he goes on this island, many situations happen...

title: Kings Go Forth
description: Toward the end of World War II, two American soldiers fighting in Southern France become romantically involved with a young, American woman. she chooses a man to love. Then a wedding is announced, and the soldiers face a dangerous mission behind enemy lines. But is everyone being truthful?

title: My Honor Was Loyalty
description: This movie is about Untersharführer Ludwig Herckel, a devoted and patriotic soldier of the elite 1st SS Panzer Division Leibstandarte SS Adolf Hitler, who faces a battle against his own thoughts for his future self.

title: Unfallen
description: A risible misfire of a contemporary war drama, the low-budget “Unfallen”2017, following twin brothers, separated during a civil war in Tajikistan, face each other years later in a new war where one is an American soldier and the other is a Taliban fighter.

title: City of Ghosts
description: The movie follows the citizen journalist collective "Raqqa is Being Slaughtered Silently" as they risk their lives to document the atrocities committed by ISIS in their homeland.

title: Megan Leavey
description: This movie is about a Marine whose devotion to her bomb-sniffing dog extends beyond the war zone. Over the course of their service, they completed more than 100 missions until an IED explosion injures them, putting their fate in jeopardy.

title: Hatred
description: Zosia Głowacka is in love with a Ukrainian boy from her village. But her father decides to marry her off to a wealthy widower. Soon World War II begins and ethnic tensions arise. Amidst the war chaos Zosia tries to survive.

title: Wunderland
description: This movie follows Lt. Robert Cappa and his platoon of 2nd Infantry Division soldiers as they must find their faith and strength to stand against the Germans in the epic fight know as "The Battle of The Bulge."

title: Gods and Generals
description: Gods and Generals is an American period war drama film written and directed by Ronald F. Maxwell about the rise and fall of legendary war hero Thomas "Stonewall" Jackson as he leads the Confederacy to great success against the Union from 1861 to 1863.

title: War Machine
description: The movie centers around a four-star general, Glenn McMahon, trying to win an “impossible” war with a radical approach, only to be taken down by a journalist's no-holds-barred exposé.

title: Sand Castle
description: Set in 2003 in Iraq, about a young machine gunner, Matt Ocre (Nicholas Hoult), discovers the true cost of war when the unit is sent on a dangerous mission to repair a water pumping station in a rural Iraqi village.

title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
description: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas is a story seen through the innocent eyes of Bruno, the eight-year-old son of the commandant at a German concentration camp. They has caught startling and unexpected consequences.

title: Check Point
description: The movie follows a sheriff and a vagrant in small-town North Carolina as they band together to infiltrate an insurgent attack that threatens to escalate into a full-blown invasion of the US.

title: Thank You for Your Service
description: Thank You for Your Service is a 2017 American biographical war drama film written and directed by Jason Hall, in his directorial debut, based on the 2013 non-fiction book of the same name by David Finkel. The film is a look at how Post Traumatic Stress Disorder affects American servicemen and women returning home from war.

title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk
description: An infantryman recounts the final hours before he and his fellow soldiers return to Iraq. Through flashbacks the film shows what really happened to his squad, contrasting the realities of war with America's perceptions.

title: Apocalypse Now Redux
description: The film is a war film replayed the time during the Vietnam War, when Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.

title: Last Flag Flying
description: Thirty years after serving together in the Vietnam War, former Navy Corps medic Richard "Doc" Shepherd, Former Marines Sal and Richard Mueller reunite to bury his son, a young Marine killed in the Iraq War.

title: Wolf Warriors 2
description: The movie tells a story of China's deadliest special forces operative named Leng Feng who takes on special missions around the world. In this sequel, he finds himself in an African country protecting medical aid workers from local rebels and vicious arms dealers.

title: Frantz
description: A young German who grieves the death of her fiancé in France meets a mysterious Frenchman who visits the fiancé's grave to lay flowers. Their relationship then develops in surprising ways and she follows him to France to explore his world and understand him fully.

title: Restrepo
description: Restrepo is an American documentary film about the Afghanistan war, directed by American journalist Sebastian Junger. The film chronicles the lives of the men from their deployment to the time of their return home, and begins with video footage of PFC Restrepo

title: Legion of Brothers
description: Immediately after the 9/11 attacks, the United States government initiated a secret war against Afghanistan, deploying fewer than one hundred Special Forces troops to fight back. The documentary also reminds that their covert missions were not conclusive and that American soldiers are still dying in that country sixteen years later.

title: Kokoda
description: Kokoda (2006) is an action which takes places in World War II. It revolves around a bitter battle between Australian and Japanese soldiers along the Kokoda trail in New Guinea.

title: 21 Brothers
description: 21 Brothers tells the story of the Canadians 21st Battalion when they prepare for the battle of Courcelette in World War I. The film follows Sgt. Reid as he must get his men ready for the impending battle. Reid must also face with the day to day difficulties of life in the trenches.

title: The Green Berets
description: The film revolves around cynical newspaper reporter George Beckworth who picks two teams of crack Green Berets for a mission in South Vietnam in order to to sneak behind enemy lines and kidnap an important Viet Cong commander.

title: The Tuskegee Airmen
description: The film tells the true adventures of the 'Fighting 99th', the first squadron of black American pilots to enter the aerial battlefield, as well as how they overcame racist opposition.

title: At War with the Army
description: The film follows two soldiers in the US army training camp during World War II, First Sergeant Vic Puccinelli and Private First Class Alvin Korwin. Despite of their cleverness, the two have to face with continuous awkward situations in the camp. Anyway, they manage to handle the problems and make it fun.

title: Born on the Fourth of July
description: The film tells the true story of Ron Kovic, a patriotic, All-American small town athlete who shocks his family by enlisting with the Marines to fight in the Vietnam War. Paralyzed in the war, he then becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country he fought for.

title: Doctor Zhivago
description: During the Russian Revolution, poet/physician Yuri Zhivago falls in love with beautiful Lara Guishar, who has been having an affair with her mother's lover, Victor Komarovsky, an unscrupulous businessman. Yuri, however, ends up marrying his cousin, Tonya. But when he and Lara meet again years later, the spark of love reignites.

title: War and Peace
description: The film focuses on focused on two aristocratic families, their complex relationship and personal maturation on the backdrop of the historical events of the Napoleonic invasion.

title: The Battle of Algiers
description: The film depicts the rise of the nationalist movement in Algiers between 1954 and 1957, the crushing defeat it faced at the hands of the French, and its resurgence three years later. As each side resorts to ever-increasing brutality, no violent act is too unthinkable.

title: Hearts and Minds
description: A documentary of the war in Viet Nam from the eyes of the opponents is produced by Peter Davis in 1974 . It expresses the disastrous effects and terrible consequences of War for innocent people.

title: The Mountain 2
description: Set in a desolate war zone where screams of the innocent echo, on the very line between disaster and valor, the movie tells the story of a clandestine special forces squad; call sign 'Storm Bringer'.

title: 1898. Our Last Men in the Philippines
description: The movie recounts the final days of the Spanish Empire’s last colony as 50 soldiers in the Philippines have to fight for their lives as they are forgot by the Spanish Empire.

title: The Train
description: The film concentrates on a French railway inspector- Labiche. He is ordered to move his work to earn more money, but when his best friend passes away because of his working now, he makes an important decision.

title: Tigerland
description: A group of recruits go through Tigerland, a U.S. Army training camp during the mid-1960s to early 1970s located at Fort Polk, Louisiana, last stop before Vietnam for tens of thousands of young men.

title: MacArthur
description: Biopic of General Douglas MacArthur covering his war exploits during WW2 and the Korean War. It centers on the time after he had been removed from his Korean War command by President Truman for insubordination, and is recounted in flashback as he visits West Point in 1962.

title: Stalag 17
description: The story begins during a dreary Christmas 1944 for the American POWs in Stalag 17. When two escaping American World War II prisoners are killed, the German P.O.W. camp barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

title: Insyriated
description: Damascus. Every day is just a struggle to survive until tomorrow. A mother attempts to keep her family safe as war rages and a sniper lies in wait outside her home.

title: Breaker Morant
description: The film concerns the 1902 court martial of Lieutenants Harry Morant, Peter Handcock, and George Witton - one of the first war crime prosecutions in British military history. Australians serving in the British Army during the Second Anglo-Boer War, Lts. Morant, Handcock, and Witton stood accused of murdering captured enemy combatants and an unarmed civilian in the Northern Transvaal.

title: Winter War
description: January 1945. The first French regiment of paratroopers to fight with an American unit to liberate Alsace in France. An Allied Division must take the forest bordering the town of Jebsheim, several days before the attack that would later be called the ‘French Stalingrad.’ Prisoners of the cold, snow, and harsh winter conditions, and pounded by German forces, the French and American soldiers learn the violence and hell of war In this struggle for freedom and survival, they will face and unexpected enemy.

title: Redacted
description: This war film is a fictional dramatization, loosely based on the 2006 Mahmudiyah killings in Mahmoudiyah, Iraq. A montage of stories about the devastating reconstruction of the rape and murder of a 15-year-old Iraqi girl by American soldiers in Samarra in 2006. What happened?

title: Ana-ta-han
description: The film is about twelve Japanese seamen who, in June 1944, are stranded on an abandoned-and-forgotten island called An-ta-han for seven years. The island's only inhabitants are the overseer of the abandoned plantation and an attractive young Japanese woman.

title: The Age of Consequences
description: This documentary investigates the impacts of climate change on increased resource scarcity, migration, and conflict through the lens of US national security and global stability.

title: Instrument of War
description: The movie tells the true story of WWII bomber pilot Clair Cline, an American B-24 pilot captured and held as a prisoner of war in a German prison camp. Now behind Nazi barbed wire and oppression, Cline and his fellow POW's must find a way to bond together to not just survive but transcend their captivity.

title: Our Time Will Come
description: Set in the 1940s, the film tells the story of a legendary woman "Fang Gu" and her would-be-fiancé as they link up with Chinese guerrilla fighters, forging their own path to freedom.

title: The History of Love
description: The movie is about star-crossed lovers who travel from a Polish shtetl to New York's Jewish community and get separated. Years later, a lost book connects the man with the woman's daughter.

title: The Wall
description: A U.S. soldier becomes trapped behind a crumbling wall after an Iraqi sniper shoots him in the leg. He now finds himself in a fight for survival against the unseen sniper who has all of the advantages.

title: Operation Dunkirk
description: A squad of soldiers are forced to fight their way past Nazis to save an important scientist during World War II who could help turn the tide of the war. Can they protect her long enough to escape the war zone and finally end the conflict with her help?

title: The Ottoman Lieutenant
description: This is a love story between an idealistic American nurse (Hera Hilmar) and a Turkish officer (Michiel Huisman) during World War I. Now, with invading army forces at their doorstep, and the world about to plunge into all-out war, she must decide if she wants to be what other people want her to be, or to be herself.

title: Rescue Under Fire
description: Set in Afghanistan, the movie depicts the struggles the Spanish army have to face when attempting to rescue the crew of a medical helicopter that suffers an accident when helping a joint force of USA and United Nations troops.

title: Dunkirk
description: The film tells an extraordinary story which narrative follows three major threads: one beginning on land, one on the sea, and one in the air. Everything which happens is what everyone never could have imagined. Let’s see the movie.

title: Heroes Don't Come Home
description: The movie is about growing up during the war on terror; it’s about those who stay, those who go, and the struggle when they come back home. A broken promise forces two men to consider who they were and who they've become.

title: Path to War
description: The film is a portrayal of the Johnson presidency and its spiraling descent into the Vietnam War. Acting on often conflicting advice from his Secretary of Defense, Robert McNamara and other advisers, President Johnson finds his domestic policy agenda.

title: Game Of Aces
description: An attempted rescue of a German traitor who holds valuable information for the American protagonists during World War I initiates an adventure across the desert.

title: Battlefield Death Tales (Angry Nazi Zombies)
description: It tells 3 interlocking stories from the dark days of World War 2. One is a soldier on a suicide mission. A troubled family with a monster in their bomb shelter. And a supernatural investigator on her most dangerous assignment yet.

title: The Fighting Seabees
description: Wedge Donovan is a tough construction boss, building airstrips in the Pacific for the U.S. Navy during World War II. He clashes with his liaison officer, Lieutenant Commander Robert Yarrow. What will happen with him?

title: Railroad Tigers
description: The film back to Jackie Chan's classic Hong Kong films, a railroad worker and his ragtag group of freedom fighters find themselves on the wrong side of the tracks when they decide to ambush a heavily armed military train filled with desperately needed provisions.

title: Lebanon
description: The film depicts warfare as witnessed exclusively from the inside of a tank. The crew's window to the outside world is a gunsight. As a way of adding realism to the effect, every change in the horizontal and vertical viewing directions

title: The Captive Heart
description: As a war drama directed by Basil Dearden, the film takes place in 1940, a concentration-camp escapee assumes the identity of a dead British officer, only to become a prisoner of war.

title: Mine
description: After a failed assassination attempt during a mission in North Africa, a U.S. soldier (Armie Hammer) is left stranded in a desert which is filled with 33 million blast mines scattered everywhere.

title: Man Hunt
description: The film revolves around the British hunter, Thorndike vacationing in Bavaria has Hitler in his gun sight. He is captured, beaten, left for dead, and escapes back to London where he is hounded by German agents and aided by a young woman

title: Bitter Harvest
description: Based on one of the most overlooked tragedies of the 20th Century, the movie tells the story of a young man whose life is changed forever when the burgeoning Soviet Union's ambition leads to Stalin's army spilling into rural Ukraine.

title: Rules of Engagement
description: The movie takes us to the time in 1996: the US Embassy in Yemen was attacked by civilians and there were gun battles between rebels and US soldiers. The fate of those in it were threatened and even the Ambassador is inevitable.

title: Hair (1979)
description: Based on the cult Broadway musical of the 60s, the film tells a story about Claude, a young man from Oklahoma who comes to New York City. There he strikes up a friendship with a group of hippies and falls in love with Sheila, a girl from a rich family.

title: Force 10 from Navarone
description: Force 10 from Navarone is a British war film. Major Keith Mallory and Sergeant John Miller has mission to kill Nicolai .Nicolai is now known to be Colonel von Ingorslebon.

title: Fort Bliss
description: Directed and written by Claudia Myers, this drama film stars Michelle Monaghan, Ron Livingston, Pablo Schreiber,etc. After returning home from an extended tour in Afghanistan, a single mother struggles to rebuild her relationship with her young son.

title: Carla's Song
description: Carla is a Nicaraguan exile who is living a precarious life, dispersed from her family, lost her boy friend, and is preparing to commit suicide. Impressive by Carla, bus driver George Lennox tries his best to help the hapless girl. And soon will love grow and blossom.

title: The Way Ahead
description: The film tells a story of a group of conscripts are called up for World War II. Nobody believes in them who can be a strong team except their sergeant and Lieutenant. When they fight in Africa, they can prove who they are.

title: Attack
description: The film seems to be a powerful indictment against a military system. Eddie Albert is a captain who must struggles with the ups and downs and can be killed by Jack Palance's scheming.

title: Burn Country
description: The movie tells the story of an exiled Afghan journalist who moves to Northern California and takes a job with a local newspaper. But when he attempts to cover local crime, he stumbles into local corruption that puts himself and others in danger.

title: Welcome to Sarajevo
description: The story follows a group of reporters in Sarajevo during the Bosnian, who then encounters an orphanage run by dedicated Mrs. Savic. Impressed by the love of Mrs. Savic, the team decides to try their best to support her as well as help the children in the catastrophic war.

title: Sands of Iwo Jima
description: The film set in the Second World War. John Stryker gets serious problems which makes him become bitter and tough. He has meaning lessons when he fights in the deadly battle of Iwo Jima with his contemporaries.

title: Hacksaw Ridge
description: The movie depicts the extraordinary true story of WWII American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss (Andrew Garfield), who won the Congressional Medal of Honor for saving 75 men without firing or carrying a gun on religious grounds.

title: The Fighting Kentuckian
description: The film follows John Wayne is a leader of a regiment in the war in 1812. He must go through fire and water to save his love, his homeland and protects innocent people.

title: Operation Petticoat
description: The film sets in World War II. A submarine commander gets some problems in his pink submarine because of appearance of special guest. That is a con-man executive officer and army nurses wanting to go abroad to flee. What challenge will he face?

title: King and Country
description: Captain Hargreave is an Army lawyer have a mission to defend a lowly private because everyone suspects the private deserts during the battle. Captain Hargreave believes in him, but it is difficult to prove his innocent.

title: Rio Conchos
description: The film follows Richard Boone whose mission is to track down a huge of rifles are stolen and thieves in Texas. He must prevent Rebel officer from using rifles to resurrect the war which threatens innocent people's life.

title: Overlord
description: The film follows a young boy is forced to enter the British Army and fights in bloody battle. He experiences horrible days of training for D-Day and gets meaning lessons about the war and the life.

title: The Tin Drum (Die Blechtromme)
description: The film centers on Oskar who was born in 1924 is a brilliant boy. He refuses to grow as other kids on his third birthday because he realizes the bad side of his life. He chooses special life with beloved tin drum.

title: The Americanization of Emily
description: The film starring James Garner, Julie Andrews, Melvyn Douglas is directed by Arthur Hiller. It is about a American naval officer chosen for a dangerous scheme, which makes him attempt to win the heart of a British widower to get a better chance.

title: Second in Command
description: Navy Seal Commander Samuel "Sam" Keenan is assigned the task of protecting the U.S. ambassador to an unstable Eastern European nation. One day, he find himself getting trapped in the middle of a deadly coup d'etat; therefore, he must do something to fight back the attackers.

title: Abraham Lincoln
description: The biographical film cover Abraham Lincoln's life from his early year to the assassination at Ford's Theater. Most screen time concentrates on the President's time during the American Civil War.

title: Beyond Valkyrie: Dawn of the 4th Reich
description: Set in the midst of war as dissension amongst Nazi forces was on the rise, the film follows American soldiers who go behind enemy lines in the fall of 1944 to help protect a potential post-nazi, pro-western elements of the German government and end up foiling the escape of Nazis dedicated to the establishment of a Fourth Reich.

title: USS Indianapolis: Men of Courage
description: After their ship is torpedoed and sunk by a Japanese submarine, the crew members of the USS Indianapolis stranded in the Philippine Sea for five days, facing a harrowing nightmare of thirst, hunger, and relentless shark attacks.

title: Hart's War
description: A young man learning the law in Harvard university becomes a lieutenant. He is in prison and asked to protect a black murderer.

title: The Midwife
description: The film is a romance-drama set during WWII in Finland’s Lapland province, a major European battle ground of the war, following the love story of a Finnish midwife and a German-Finnish SS-officer.

title: Resistance
description: A German patrol comes to the valley to complete his mission a my special mission. So that, he has a fate encounter with Sarah who lives without her husband.

title: Ardennes Fury
description: As the Nazis engage their Battle of the Bulge campaign, in late 1944, an American tank unit gets trapped behind enemy lines. With only hours to go before the bombs of Operation Ardennes Fury fall, the tank's commander moves to rescue innocent children and nuns from a nearby orphanage.

title: Coriolanus
description: Caius Martius was dismissed and he allies with a enemy to take his retribution.

title: Bataan
description: Bataan brilliantly transforms one of America's most ignominious wartime defeats into a paean to courage and perseverance. Thirteen men are chosen to blow up a bridge on the Bataan peninsula and keep the Japanese from rebuilding it.

title: Back to Bataan
description: As the U.S. Army under General MacArthur struggles to hold on at Bataan against the Japanese, Colonel Joseph Madden (John Wayne) agrees to say behind to organize an underground resistance movement against the Japanese invaders.

title: Angels One Five
description: Set in the Summer of 1940, the plot centres on a young fighter pilot immediately before and during the Battle of Britain in the Second World War. Without the bravery of him and other pilots, Britain may well have been invaded.

title: Catch-22
description: Along with his squadron members, Capt. John Yossarian (Alan Arkin) is committed to flying dangerous missions, and after watching friends die, he tries desperately to be certified insane as a mean of escape.

title: Death in Love
description: The film follows two sons of a Jewish woman as they struggle to deal with their mother's affair with the Nazi doctor overseeing human experimentation at a Nazi German concentration camp.

title: The Big Red One
description: Set during World War II, the film details the experiences of several US soldiers from The Big Red One, serving in an infantry squad as part of a rifle company and the effects of the war on them.

title: Gernika
description: Since Henry, a cynical American journalist who has lost his soul, and Teresa, an editor of the Republican press office and in charge of overseeing the news that journalists can send abroad, meet each other, their lives change forever!

title: 25 April
description: The tragic 1915 Gallipoli Campaign of WW1 is told through the perspective of six New Zealanders who were involved. Inspired by graphic novels, the filmmakers use animation to go beyond the limitations of the usual black-and-white archive images of the war.

title: Casualties of War
description: The film tells the story of Eriksson, a member of an American squadron stationed in the deepest jungles of Southeast Asia, who refuses to rape a young Vietnamese girl during Vietnam War. And then tensions between him and the rest of the unit heat up and finally explode during a firefight with Viet Cong troops.

title: Beneath Hill 60
description: Set during World War I, a series of mines filled with explosive charges are placed beneath German lines to aid the advance of British troops. The 1st Australian Tunnelling Company attempts to detonate it.

title: All Quiet on the Western Front
description: One of the most influential anti-war films ever made, this drama highlights the tragedy of war through the eyes of individuals, following a group of German schoolboys, talked into enlisting at the beginning of World War I by their jingoistic teacher.

title: Chosen
description: From director Jasmin Dizdar, starring legendary actor Harvey Keitel, the film follows an unassuming Hungarian lawyer who ends up leading an anti-Nazi resistance near the end of the Second World War.

title: Sniper Ghost Shooter
description: Elite snipers Brandon Beckett and Richard Miller tasked with protecting a gas pipeline from terrorists looking to make a statement. After skirmishes with the enemy result in American snipers getting killed by a ghost shooter locked into their exact location, the team suspects a security breach.

title: The Battle of Culloden
description: The film portrays the 1746 Battle of Culloden that resulted in the British Army's destruction of the Scottish Jacobite rising of 1745, including on-the-spot interviews with the participants, revealing the meager circumstances of the Scot soldiers and the questionable competence of Charles Edward Stuart.

title: A Better Tomorrow 3: Love and Death in Saigon
description: At the end of the Vietnam war, Cheung goes to Saigon, intent on bringing his uncle and cousin back to Hong Kong. There he meets and falls in love with a beautiful gang-leader with a dangerous ex.

title: U-571
description: When a German U-571 submarine with a sophisticated encryption machine onboard is sunk during a World War II battle at sea, an American Navy force is sent to seize the 'enigma coding machine'. But masquerading as Nazi's and taking over the U-boat is the smallest of their problems...

title: A Bridge Too Far
description: Allied paratroops land in 1944 Holland to capture six bridges leading to Germany. However, the Allies soon learn that they may be overconfident; mismanagement and poor planning result in its failure.

title: South Pacific
